html:
Godspeed You! Black Emperor is postponing the remaining U.S. stops of their 2024 North American tour, according to a statement posted to the Constellation Records Instagram page. Earlier this month, the Canadian post-rock group cancelled dates in Nashville, Knoxville, Atlanta, citing a “band health situation.” The postponement includes tonight’s show in Saxapahaw, NC, plus Washington, D.C., Brooklyn, Norwalk, Conn., Boston, and Philadelphia.

Godspeed You! also have two performances scheduled in Montreal, Quebec on November 25 and 26; it is unclear whether these will be likewise affected by the postponement. The band’s North American tour kicked off earlier this month in Grand Rapids, Mich. Their latest album, “NO TITLE AS OF 13 FEBRUARY 2024 28,340 DEAD”, came out in October.

Godspeed You! Black Emperor:

11-17 Saxapahaw, NC - Haw River Ballroom
11-19 Washington, D.C. - 9:30 Club
11-21 Brooklyn, NY - Pioneerworks
11-22 Norwalk, CT - District Music Hall
11-23 Boston, MA - Roadrunner
11-24 Philadelphia, PA - Union Transfer
